aiAdvisor.sampleResponse2: Your recent posts show strong performance! Your engagement rate has increased by 12% this month. Posts with images perform 45% better than text-only posts. Consider adding more visual content to maintain this growth.
aiAdvisor.sampleResponse3: Here are some content ideas tailored to your audience: 1) Behind-the-scenes content about your workflow, 2) Tips and tricks related to your industry, 3) User-generated content showcasing customer success stories. These types of posts typically generate 2x more engagement.
